name: Brain Surgery Simulator 3D Free
description:
Patients are injured, and their brain is damaged! Be a surgeon performing a brain operation! Treat patients, upgrade doctor's skills and have fun! Feel lika a doctor with Brain Surgery Simulator 3D!

Play as a surgeon helping patients to have a successful brain surgery! Check patients' status while the operation, remove brain tumor and save their lifes being a doctor! Try realistic brain surgery simulator! Be a doctor, use special tools to treat patients and remove brain tumor! Perfom an operation and treat patients with Brain Surgery Simulator 3D!

Brain Surgery Simulator 3D features:

- Surgeon simulator
- Perform operation, upgade doctor's skills and save patients' lifes
- Remove brain tumor
- Medical supplies to treat patients


Join our doctor team being a surgeon with this Brain Surgery Simulator! Use doctor's skill to perform the best brain tumor surgery ever! Try each operation to treat patients! Feel like a doctor removing a tumor with Brain Surgery Simulator 3D!
